entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Alliston

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
